item.title: About Circle
item.description: This is the content about circle app.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Total Privacy Circle does not have user analytics data or tracking data and does not have any ad plug-ins. Personal data related to the user is not uploaded to the server; only the channel relationship data used by the user is stored on the server. Privacy Policy We take our customers’ privacy very seriously. Any data collected through the Circle app is governed by this policy. Use of Circle implies that you agree to the terms and conditions of this privacy policy.

item.title: Use Workout Channel to list workout records
item.description: Start use workout channel to list finished records.

item.title: User Support
item.description: Contact Us We provid contact us entry in profile page. Welcome your any feedback. You can also click send us an email to contact us. Keep Update Follow us on Twitter. We post updates for new release and event provide links for public beta versions, so you can test out new version before they go global. Twitter: @hagerhu
